title: (x) Japanese ITC Century-like font - Motoya Shimbun Mincho {BenP (self)}
content:
Hello,   
I'm trying to identify this font, which looks a lot like ITC Century Light but has even less contrast.   
 ![jagda](http://web.archive.org/web/20050528000620im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/70021.jpg)   
And here's ITC Century Light:   
 ![century](http://web.archive.org/web/20050528000620im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/70022.jpg)   
   
The original was found in a Japanese design yearbook, so it's possible that it's only available as part of a Japanese font...   
   
Anyway, thanks for any help!   
   
Regards,   
Ben
author: BP

comments.content:
This is the Roman alphabet that comes with Mincho. It actually seems to be based on a very light Century Oldstyle, rather than ITC Century.   
   
Here's a typical sample [Kozuka Mincho](http://web.archive.org/web/20050528000620/http:/store.adobe.com/type/browser/F/KOMI/F_KOMI-10005000.html) from Adobe.
Thank you Ralph, I haven't found the exact font yet but thanks to you I'm on the right track ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20050528000620im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)

I found it! ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20050528000620im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)   
WIthout expecting much I e-mailed the publisher of the book just to see, and they provided all the information about the font! That is VERY cool of them.

> * * *
> **quote:**
> 
> The font is called "Motoya Shimbun Mincho", by font maker Motoya.   
> The designer slightly extended alphanumeric character horizontally.   
>    
> - Motoya's website: [http://www.motoya.co.jp/](http://web.archive.org/web/20050528000620/http:/www.motoya.co.jp/)   
> - list of their fonts: [http://www.motoyafont.jp/](http://web.archive.org/web/20050528000620/http:/www.motoyafont.jp/)
> 
> * * *  
 ![motoya](http://web.archive.org/web/20050528000620im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/70526.jpg)   
Case closed! ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20050528000620im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)
